Trade/Device Name(s): i-STAT CHEM8+ cartridge with the i-STAT 1 System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for i-STAT CHEM8+ cartridge with the i-STAT 1 System for quantification of ionized calcium in whole blood using ion selective electrode technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantification of ionized calcium in arterial or venous whole blood in point of care or clinical laboratory settings; used in diagnosis and treatment of parathyroid disease, bone diseases, chronic renal disease, and tetany
